title: A question about dropping tiers?
body:
I just made it to silver 5 (really happy ^^) but i was just wondering how many losses it takes to drop back into bronze? I don't want to freak out if i suddenly have a really bad losing spree from 0 LP, just wondering.

Also just as a word of encouragement, i got put in B4 at the beginning of the season, had an 8 game losing streak and fell straight away to B5, and have now managed to climb to S5, so if you are feeling as down-heartened atm as i was back then, know that it is possible, I'm not the best player but a positive attitude helps ^^

replies.body: it's all mmr based, so it's not always the same number of losses. it tends to be about 10-15 though.
10-15? I've dropped out of divisions in 3 losses, however, tiers may be different, I've never dropped out of a tier.....................................cause I'm bronze..............so.......... :~)
